name: CITY OF ALEDO, TEXAS
sampleDescriptions: Assist Client with federal government issues that impact local and state government entities, specifically appropriations for community project funding.
Fiscal Year 2026 Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, including issues related to community project funding for wastewater infrastructure.
